title: Chapter 4299 - Chapter 4299: Old Man Jian 4298, Song Ta
body:
Chapter 4299 - Chapter 4299: Old Man Jian 4298, Song Ta

Chapter 4299: Old Man Jian 4298, Song Ta

Translator: 549690339

The fragment of the god of elements in Wang Xian’s hands was very valuable.

The old man with the sword form was one of the transactions with Wang Xian.

Wang Xian saw the resources in front of him and nodded. With a wave of his arm, a fragment of the god of elements flew in front of him.

The resources in front of him also flew over.

Wang Xian grabbed the fishing line and sensed it carefully.

This was indeed the same aura that the god of dark elements emitted earlier.

This was forged from the material produced by the god of dark elements.

Wang Xian grabbed the fishing line and the fishing information that the old man in the pagoda gave him surfaced in his mind.

To fish, one must first refine some of the fragments of the god of elements!

After refining it, a wisp of his spirit could sink into it.

Then, he tied the fishing line to the fragment of the Elemental God and threw it into it.

As it was the same material, it would not be attacked.

He controlled the fragment of the Elemental God with his spirit and searched for other treasures in it. Then, he used the fishing line to bind it.

This was the method of the fisherman!

“I am Wang Xian. Thank you for your advice!”

After Wang Xian understood everything, he cupped his hands at the two of them!

“My Name Is Song Ta. You can call him Geezer Jian. He’s not good with words.”

Song Ta, who was holding the pagoda, cupped his hands at Wang Xian with a smile. “It’s just a small matter. Since this brother is fine, you can fish here too!”

“I won’t fish for the time being. I want to go in and take a look later!”

Wang Xian smiled and shook his head.

Song Ta and Geezer Jian were both strong practitioners of the Great Dao. Wang Xian would give them a lot of face.

The two of them naturally knew that Wang Xian was not simple, so he was very polite to him.

This was the respect brought about by strength!

Wang Xian cupped his hands at the two of them once again. His body moved and he flew into the distance!

“This Wang Xian is very strong. I wonder which universe he is from.”

Watching Wang Xian leave, song ta opened his mouth and said.

“He is very strong!”

Old Man Jian echoed. The two of them did not say anything else.

The universe was vast and chaotic. Similarly, there were countless experts.

Before the arrival of the apocalypse, they were invincible existences in their own universe.

However, when the apocalypse arrived, the experts from the other universes would also come out to gain experience and search for treasures and opportunities!

There were too many mysterious powerhouses!

They did not delve too deeply into it!

After Wang Xian entered the battlefield and distanced himself from the two powerhouses, he once again entered the battlefield of the two elemental gods.

The power of yin and yang circulated. After Wang Xian entered the battlefield, he immediately flew toward the elemental god of light.

Two days later, he arrived in front of the elemental god of light and stared at the sharp sword once again!

The Sword of light was still floating there and did not disappear.

Wang Xian’s eyes were shining.

“I wonder if I can get it with the fishing method!”

Wang Xian thought to himself. He took out a fishing line and tied a bait to it.

Following that, he threw the bait with his arm and wrapped it around the sharp sword.

This fishing line was very special. It was made from the light and dark substances in this area.

The condition of this material was similar to Wang Xian’s current condition!

Furthermore, this fishing line was very soft and west. Its interior was extremely sturdy and would not break under the impact.

As long as the bait was used to entangle the sharp sword, there was a chance to pull the sword over.

The bait was made using a special method. Wang Xian could control it and he was also Wang Xian’s other eye.

Under Wang Xian’s control, the bait approached the sharp sword!

Buzz! Buzz

When the bait approached, a bright force suddenly charged over.

The bait made from the god of elements’fragments flew into the distance under this force.

Wang Xian frowned slightly when he saw this scene.

He couldn’t use energy to resist the force of the impact.

Although the fishing line was very strong, there was a prerequisite that it could not compete with the energy of the Elemental God.

Otherwise, once it was resisted, the fishing line would be melted!

It could follow the energy fluctuations and could not compete with the energy!

When Wang Xian saw this, he could only helplessly control the bait to approach the sword of light bit by bit.

The Sword of light was located next to the Elemental God.

All the light elemental energy in the surroundings originated from the elemental god of light.

It would erupt waves of light elemental energy tides in the surroundings.

There were no rules regarding the time when the tides would erupt.

Once the tides erupted and struck the fishing line, it would not be able to approach the sword of light at all!

In addition, there would be dark tides that would sometimes come charging over.

If there was such a situation, it would be easy for the bait to get close to the Sword of light.

However, there was another point. When the dark tide arrived, the direction of impact was not fixed.

It might be able to impact the bait to another part of the Sword of light.

In short, after Wang Xian had tried for two whole days, the bait had only recently reached the position of a thousand meters away from the sword of light.

It could be said that there was still a huge gap between them.

“This is very difficult. It is too difficult to obtain the treasures beside the god of elements.”

“It is almost impossible to fish in such a manner unless one’s luck is heaven-defying!”

Wang Xian thought to himself as a helpless expression appeared on his face.

However, for now, this was the only chance for Wang Xian.

If he were to fish outside the elemental god, the probability of obtaining this sharp sword was one in ten billion.

If he were to fish here, the probability would be one in a million!

The probability was much higher, but it still required countless attempts.

“Let’s take it slow. After all, this is a treasure that is comparable to the combat strength of a beginner in the Heaven’s origin creation. How can it be so easy to obtain!”

Wang Xian thought to himself. He was not in a hurry. He was calmly fishing in the battlefield of the god of elements!

As he failed time and time again, time passed day by day.

Soon, tens of thousands of years passed. However, Wang Xian still did not manage to catch the Sword of light!

Time passed again. Wang Xian tried tens of billions of times but failed every time.

This made him feel that the probability of success was much lower than what he had predicted.

“Oh right, I forgot about the divination lamp. I can use the divination lamp to perform divination again and again. The efficiency is tens of thousands of times faster than my current speed, right?”

Another hundred thousand years passed. Wang Xian suddenly patted his head and took out the divination lamp.

The divination lamp could not predict whether he would succeed or not in advance.

Therefore, it could save him a lot of time.

The only drawback was that the lamp of divination could only perform divination for five minutes.

Using it for five minutes would take more than a year to recharge.

This was still many times faster than before!

This was because after these five minutes, Wang Xian could obtain countless results.

With this thought in mind, Wang Xian immediately took out the lamp of divination to test the success rate!
